DOC.brief_summary: This study 's primary objective compare efficacy tolerability switch patient inadequate relief generic SSRIs levomilnacipran versus add new treatment ( quetiapine ER ) exist treatment people diagnose depression ( major depression disorder ) . The secondary objective examine response remission rate follow switch generic SSRI levomilnacipran ER augmentation quetiapine along examine change neurocognitive apathy measure switch .
DOC.brief_title: Levomilnacipran ER vs. Adjunctive Quetiapine ER Adults With Inadequate Relief With SSRIs MDD
